meanings.definition: (noun) A derogatory term used to refer to a person who is despicable or contemptible.
meanings.sent1: Those motherfuckers stole my lunch money!
meanings.sent2: I can't believe those motherfuckers cheated on the test.
meanings.sent3: The motherfuckers at the office keep stealing my pens.
meanings.sent4: The motherfuckers in the movie were the villains who tried to take over the world.
meanings.sent5: I'll never forget the motherfuckers who betrayed me.

meanings.definition: (adjective) Used to describe something as extremely frustrating or annoying.
meanings.sent1: Dealing with this motherfuckers computer issue is driving me crazy.
meanings.sent2: The motherfuckers traffic jam made me late for work.
meanings.sent3: I can't stand this motherfuckers slow internet connection.
meanings.sent4: The motherfuckers rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: The motherfuckers customer service line kept me on hold for hours.
